response.overview: Convention Creeps is a film that delves into the unique subculture of horror convention enthusiasts. Through candid conversations, it explores the passion, quirks, and occasional chaos that come with being a dedicated attendee. From collectors hunting rare memorabilia to cosplayers perfecting their monstrous transformations, and fans eagerly meeting their cinematic idols, the film captures the energy and camaraderie of these gatherings. At its core, Convention Creeps is not just about the conventions themselves, but about the people who bring them to lifeâ€”the die-hard fans, the behind-the-scenes organizers, and the iconic guests who make every event unforgettable.
response.title: Convention Creeps
